snippet: Maria Sharapova’s return to WTA tournament play after more than a month away was short-lived following an upset loss to 17th-ranked Sloane Stephens, 2-6, 7-6 (5), 6-3.
abstract: Sloane Stephens upsets Maria Sharapova in second round of Western & Southern Open tennis tournament in Mason, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova’s return to WTA tournament play after more than a month away was short-lived following an upset loss to 17th-ranked Sloane Stephens, 2-6, 7-6 (5), 6-3.

headline.print_headline:
Sharapova Is Upset
By Stephens in Ohio
